notes: Koh Samui, Thailand. PR & Communications Manager on-property. One of the most photogenic luxury villa resorts in Southeast Asia, with a dedicated Envoy influencer program. Ideal for high-end travel content.

Kata Beach, Phuket. Has a dedicated influencer request form at katarocks.com/influencers/. Oceanfront luxury pool villas, very Instagram-worthy architecture and infinity pool. Actively collaborates with content creators.
Kamala, Phuket. Stunning treehouse pool villas in the jungle, extremely popular with luxury travel influencers. Press/marketing email confirmed from Instagram bio and press page.
Cherngtalay, Phuket. Ultra-luxury private pool villas on a private bay. Represented by Balcony Media Group for international press. host@trisara.com is the primary communications channel.

Layan Beach, Phuket. Karl Webster is Area Director of PR & Communications covering Anantara Layan and Anantara Mai Khao Phuket. Beachfront luxury resort under Minor Hotels. Actively issues press releases.

Laguna area, Phuket. Dedicated media/PR email confirmed. Has a formal Media/Influencer Request Form (14 days notice required). Stylish beachfront resort in the Laguna complex, popular with content creators.
Phi Phi Island, Krabi, Thailand. Dedicated media PR email confirmed. Overwater bungalows and beachfront villas in one of Thailand's most iconic island locations. Very social-media worthy.

Railay Bay, Krabi. Dedicated PR email confirmed. Set among towering limestone cliffs on a private peninsula accessible only by boat. One of Thailand's most visually spectacular resorts. Perfect for content creation.

Koh Lanta, Krabi. Dedicated media email confirmed. 100-acre eco-luxury resort on Ba Kan Tiang Beach. Has been featured in influencer content as a luxury eco resort. Part of Small Luxury Hotels of the World.

Cape Panwa, Phuket. Dedicated PR email confirmed. Luxury pool villa hotel and private residences on a private cape. Has a press portal at press.sripanwa.com. Award-winning resort, highly social-media active.
Kamala Beach, Phuket. Nikki is the Director of Marketing Communications, confirmed email. Clifftop luxury resort with stunning ocean views. Has an active newsroom and issues regular press releases.

Bangkok, Thailand (Charoenkrung/riverside). Named one of the best luxury hotels in Bangkok. Iconic riverside location on Chao Phraya. PR contact name and email directly confirmed. Very Instagram-worthy design hotel.
Ploenchit, Bangkok. Part of luxury Rosewood group. General hotel email confirmed as primary contact for media inquiries. Ultra-modern luxury hotel tower. Has an active media page with press releases.

Bangkok riverside, Chao Phraya. Historic iconic luxury hotel featured in The White Lotus Season 3. Email confirmed. Group PR contact also via press.mandarinoriental.com. Legendary brand, hugely appealing for content creators.
Mae Rim, Chiang Mai. PR Manager confirmed. #1 Resort in Thailand per Travel + Leisure. Stunning rice terrace setting with luxury pavilions. Ideal for lifestyle and travel content creators.

Nawatgate Road, Chiang Mai. Boutique heritage hotel in a restored 19th-century teakwood mansion. Part of Small Luxury Hotels of the World. Email confirmed. Stunning colonial aesthetic, very photogenic.

Koh Yao Noi, Phang Nga Bay, Thailand. Marketing Communications Manager confirmed. Spectacular limestone karst views, eco-luxury villas. Six Senses has a global PR contacts page. Perfect for wellness and travel influencer content.

Natai Beach, Phang Nga (near Phuket). Beachfront luxury pool villa hotel with beach club by Sri Panwa. Email confirmed. 54K Instagram followers. Very active with influencers and content creators. Beach club format ideal for social content.

brand_name: Four Seasons Resort The Nam Hai, Hoi An
notes: Ha My Beach, Hoi An/Da Nang, Vietnam. PR contact confirmed. Forbes 5-Star beachfront resort with private pool villas. Travel + Leisure Top 500 Hotels 2025. World-class photography opportunity.

brand_name: Four Seasons Resort The Nam Hai, Hoi An (Secondary Contact)
notes: Ha My Beach, Hoi An/Da Nang, Vietnam. Secondary PR contact confirmed. Same property as above - both Linh and Van Inthorn handle press and influencer requests for the resort.

Son Tra Peninsula, Da Nang, Vietnam. Press/influencer contact confirmed. Bill Bensley-designed resort with dramatic clifftop setting overlooking the South China Sea. One of Vietnam's most visually striking luxury hotels.

contact_name: Area Director of Public Relations - Vietnam
notes: Hoi An Ancient Town, Vietnam. Area PR director email for Vietnam properties confirmed. Boutique resort in the heart of Hoi An's heritage zone with colonial architecture. Ideal for cultural and luxury travel content.
Phu Quoc Island, Vietnam. Sales/partnership email confirmed. Boutique 5-star luxury resort on Vietnam's most beautiful island. Stunning infinity pool overlooking the sea. Active on Instagram.

Phu Quoc Island, Vietnam. Shannon Barry is Director of Marketing and Communications. General hotel email confirmed. Legendary Regent brand's Vietnam debut. Stunning beachfront resort and villas. Has dedicated press page.

Con Dao Islands, Vietnam. Director of Sales confirmed. Represented by BIRD Luxury Travel PR. Eco-luxury resort on a pristine protected island. Six Senses has a media center with contact forms. Perfect for sustainable travel content.

Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon), Vietnam. General contact confirmed; media inquiries directed via Newsroom at thereveriesaigon.com/newsroom/. Represented by Balcony Media Group. Opulent Italian-designed interiors, ultra-luxury flagship of Ho Chi Minh City.

Hoan Kiem, Hanoi, Vietnam. Email confirmed. Represented by Balcony Media Group for international press. Iconic 1901 French colonial heritage hotel. One of Asia's most photographed historic hotels. Featured in international travel media regularly.

Hoi An, Vietnam. General contact email confirmed. New boutique resort opened 2024, uniquely Vietnamese hospitality concept. Has a press zone on website. Located near Hoi An's historic town. Fresh opening makes it excellent for exclusive content.

Siem Reap, Cambodia (near Angkor Wat). Raffles email format confirmed (first.last@raffles.com); general property email. Represented by Balcony Media Group for PR. 1930s French Art Deco landmark. Iconic heritage hotel with Angkor Wat backdrop - extraordinary content opportunity.

brand_name: Shinta Mani Angkor & Bensley Collection Pool Villas
notes: Siem Reap, Cambodia. PR contact confirmed - Lee Sutton at Dynamic PR & Events handles all media inquiries. Bill Bensley-designed boutique hotel in Siem Reap's French Quarter. Incredible design-forward content opportunity in Cambodia's temple heartland.

Vattanac Capital Tower, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Email format confirmed (first.last@rosewoodhotels.com). Has active media center and press kit page. Skyline views from Phnom Penh's tallest building. Ultra-modern luxury in Cambodia's capital city.

Yangon, Myanmar. Belmond corporate PR contact confirmed. Elegant 1920s teak colonial mansion in Yangon's Embassy Quarter. Belmond (LVMH) has comprehensive PR infrastructure. Exotic Myanmar destination with powerful visual appeal for luxury content.

brand_name: Rocky's Boutique Resort Koh Samui (Veranda Collection)
notes: Lamai Beach, Koh Samui. Has a dedicated Media & Influencer Request page (rockyresort.com/press). Reservations email confirmed. Responds within 24 hours to media requests (1 week advance notice required). Boutique beachfront resort, very social-media friendly.

Bophut area, Koh Samui. W Hotels (Marriott) email format confirmed. First W hotel in Thailand with 74 private pool villas. 47K Instagram followers. Active influencer collaboration program. Bold, design-forward brand perfect for fashion and lifestyle content.

Mai Khao, northern Phuket. Same Area Director of PR as Anantara Layan (Karl Webster) confirmed. Beachfront pool villas on Phuket's longest and most pristine beach. Great for quiet luxury and nature content.

brand_name: Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui (Envoy Program)
notes: Koh Samui, Thailand - Press hub. Has a formal Envoy Influencer Requests program in addition to standard press. Private hilltop villas overlooking the Gulf of Thailand. One of SE Asia's most-photographed resort settings.

Koh Lanta, Krabi. Adults-only luxury boutique resort on Phra-Ae Beach. Email confirmed. Part of MBK Hotel group. Intimate luxury setting with long beach and lush gardens. Good fit for couples/honeymoon and fashion content creators.

brand_name: Victoria Hoi An Beach Resort & Spa
notes: Cua Dai Beach, Hoi An, Vietnam. Email confirmed. Ranked #1 Beachfront Resort in Hoi An. Part of Thien Minh Group (TMG) with active media corner. Beachfront infinity pool, colonial architecture, 5km from Hoi An Ancient Town.

Lamai Beach, Koh Samui. Banyan Group has a dedicated Media/Influencer Request Form (news.groupbanyan.com/press-list/join/). Newsroom email confirmed. Luxury all-pool villa resort in a private bay. 88 villas with jungle terrace setting. Visually stunning.

Ao Nang, Krabi. Same Banyan Group media contacts apply. Luxury clifftop villas with dramatic Andaman Sea and karst limestone views. Banyan Tree has a formal influencer request process. Spectacular visual setting.

brand_name: Aman Hotels (Global - for Amanpuri Phuket & Amansara Cambodia)
notes: Global PR email for Aman properties including Amanpuri (Phuket, Thailand) and Amansara (Siem Reap, Cambodia). Email confirmed. Aman properties are the pinnacle of ultra-luxury and extremely sought-after for high-end travel content. Petrie PR also handles Aman in Asia.
